messages.subject: Can we drop the abortion "conversation", please?
messages.msgSnippet: AAAAAaaaaaGGGGGhhhhhhhh!!!!!!!!!!  Enough of abortion!  Please, let s drop the politics and get back on track and be nice to each other before we lose
messages.messageBody:
AAAAAaaaaaGGGGGhhhhhhhh!!!!!!!!!! Enough of abortion! Please, let's drop
the "politics" and get "back on track" and be nice to each other before we
lose other subbers. This is a great list and I hate to think that others
will unsub from it because of this ongoing political discussion. A few
mentions and thoughtful commentary is one thing, but this stream has become
almost all-encompassing.

Jen (who's getting off the soapbox now...)

P.S. --- Hey, maybe some of you want to take it off-list? That way you can
continue in your discussion without the aforementioned problems possibly
occurring.
